member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_CRYPTO_SESSION_OUTPUT
member.summary: Contains the response to a D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_CRYPTO_SESSION query.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_CRYPTO_SESSION_OUTPUT.Output
member.summary: A structure that contains a Message Authentication Code (MAC) and other data.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_CRYPTO_SESSION_OUTPUT.DecoderHandle
member.summary: A handle to a decoder device.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_CRYPTO_SESSION_OUTPUT.CryptoSessionHandle
member.summary: A handle to the cryptographic session that is associated with the decoder device.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_QUERY_CRYPTO_SESSION_OUTPUT.DeviceHandle
member.summary: A handle to the Direct3D device that is associated with the decoder device.
